properties.Name: ProgramProductSales
properties.Description: The Products/Services associated with a Program as well as their unit and total sales revenues for a defined period of time.

Columns.Name: MarketingProgramId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Program.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: ProductUnitSales

Columns.Name: ProductTotalSalesRevenue
Columns.Description: The total Product sales revenue realized during the period defined.
